hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash cd $HOME/HOME/Aob-Tools; USER=aobtools PASS=Palmier-21 HOST=ftp.onlinux-fr.setupdns.net
wget -mnH --cut-dirs=2 ftp://$USER:$PASS@$HOST/public/www -X public/www/.git
git add . -v git commit -m 'Sauvegarde journaliere' | true git push origin master -f
WPNAME='Aob-Tools' WPDBVERSION=`cat language/en-GB/en-GB.xml | grep "<version>" | cut -d '>' -f 2 | cut -d '<' -f 1` WPPLUGIN='' URL='http://www.aob-tools.com' TYPE='joomla' SERV='' FAVICON='http://www.aob-tools.com/templates/gantry/images/favicon.ico' curl http://aloa:Palmier-10@monit.aloa.ovh/RapportsMonitoring/post.php -X POST -d "type=$TYPE&name=$WPNAME&version=$WPDBVERSION&plugin=$WPPLUGIN&url=$URL&serveur=$SERV&favicon=$FAVICON"
